USER QUERY: When either spare - 4 or spare - 2 receives a Fast Off during weekend mornings (08:00-12:00 on Sat/Sun), set both spare - 2 and spare - 4 backlights to 100% and persist the changes.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekend fast-off sets spare-2 and spare-4 backlight to 100%",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When either spare - 4 or spare - 2 receives Fast Off during weekend mornings, set both backlights to 100% and write changes.",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "6 49 CC 4", "control": "DFOF" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "6 49 CC 2", "control": "DFOF" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "sat,sun", "from": { "time": "08:00", "to": { "time": "12:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "6 49 CC 2", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 100, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "6 49 CC 2", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "6 49 CC 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 100, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "6 49 CC 4", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "A weekend morning Fast Off on either spare device is treated as a manual cue to maximize visibility; set both devices' backlights to maximum and persist the change."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
